name: mildewed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
covered in mildew (= an organism that grows in warm, wet conditions ): mildewed rose bushes He stepped down into the room, where the smell of mildewed carpet and cloth hit him. See
mildew
More examplesFewer examplesIn in one shed, there was a small collection of mildewed school books.He rested a hand on the back of a mildewed chair, feeling its dirt and its dampness.Officers who entered the house found mouldy and mildewed food in the dining room.
